title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Skills: Mobile Semi-Fictional Narrative-Based Construction Industry Accident Prevention

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify risk factors that may occur at construction sites with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose three or more thinking prevention strategies through the analysis of generated semi-fictional narratives.
Learners can explain the safety protocol application procedure with 90% accuracy based on simulated accident scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
